DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pain experience patient transvaginal oocyte retrieval ultrasound guidance perform reduce single lumen needle ( Vitrolife Sweden AB , Gothenburg ) patient follicle aspiration needle , 1.4 outer diameter ( Vitrolife Sweden AB , Gothenburg ) , procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Experience Pain During Oocyte Retrieval- Comparison Between Two Aspiration Needles
DOC.detailed_description: Although patient sedate local analgesia give , transvaginal oocyte retrieval ultrasound guidance still cause lot pain , procedure . To reduce pain , clinic prefer use needle thin 0.8 mm ( out diameter , OD ) . A disadvantage needle increase aspiration time . Therefore new needle develop possibility reduce pain without large increase aspiration time . The needle 50 mm long tip outer diameter 0.9 mm . The remain part needle 300 mm long outer diameter 1.4 mm .
